function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of unverified COVID-19 information on social media","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation and panic","Mitigation":"Promote fact-checking and verify sources before sharing information","Technologies":"Social media fact-checking algorithms","People":"Social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Enforcement of preventive measures, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health messaging","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Deployment of military for COVID-19 supervision","Impact":"Potential civil rights violations, fear and anxiety among citizens","Mitigation":"Transparency in military activities, clear communication with citizens","Technologies":"Public communication channels, community engagement platforms","People":"Citizens of Bangladesh","Owner":"Government, military command"}]}
